snippet.title: The Academy: The First Riddle - Store Trailer | OUT NOW
snippet.description: The Academy: The First Riddle is a puzzle-packed adventure set in a school filled with mystery. The Academy is now available on Steam (PC and Mac), Google Play, and the App Store. More info about the game: http://theacademygame.com/
